results.title: Mighty Ducks 2
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Jordan Kerner, Jon Avnet and Sam Weisman
results.brief_description: Emilio Estevez returns in another heartwarming comedy about the Mighty Ducks; an ice-hockey team full of misfit teenagers with the desire to be the best they can be. The team win an opportunity to represent their country in the Junior Goodwill Games to be held in Los Angeles. Two challenges await them - the fierce competition in the form of the team from Iceland and resisting the Hollywood glitz and glamour which threatens to tear them apart. Only team spirit will help them overcome these obstacles.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Pictures, Jordan Kerner, Jon Avnet and Sam Weisman

results.title: Mighty Aphrodite
results.creator_credit: Magnolia Productions, Sweetland Films BV, Robert Greenhut and Woody Allen
results.brief_description: Writer-director Woody Allen plays Lenny, a sportswriter who is dissatisfied in his marriage to art dealer, Amanda. Lenny becomes obsessed with locating his adopted son’s natural mother, feeling convinced that she will be a brilliant and intelligent person. Instead she’s Linda, a ditzy porn star and prostitute. Despite the initial disillusionment, Lenny soon develops a fondness for Linda, and decides to help her get her life back on track. Cast includes: Woody Allen, Mira Sorvino, Helena Bonham Carter, Michael Rapaport, F. Murray Abraham, Olympia Dukakis and Peter Weller.

results.title: Mightier than the sword
results.creator_credit: Ron Johnston, Mischa Scorer, Channel 4 and Antelope Films
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Testament: The Bible and history”.
The written word became of immense importance to the Jews. During the time of the Babylonian exile to the destruction of Solomon’s temple, the final format of the Old Testament was created. The influence of the Greeks and Romans on Israel is discussed and in particular the role of King Herod the Great who tried to act as a liason between his people and the roman invaders. The Old Testament was finally gathered together in 70 AD however the finding of the Dead Sea Scrolls raises issues about the authorship and history of the Old Teastament.

results.title: Might, majesty and mysticism
results.creator_credit: Ian Austin, Dennis Porter and East Coast Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Hidden India Series”.
India is synonymous with mysticism and this film goes on to explore the many incredible facets of this way of life - and death. Many people from around the world are flocking to India, not as tourists, not to see the might and majesty (of breathtaking architecture that is)… They come to find themselves through the teachings of the gurus, the powerful holy men. Might and majesty in the guise of mysticism has returned to India.

results.title: Miffy: best friends are great
results.creator_credit: Kodansha, Dick Bruna, Japan Inc, Mercis Media, Yuzuru Otagawa, Yukiko Omura, Yoshimasa Mizou and Toshio Nishiuchi
results.brief_description: The stories of Miffy and her friends have enchanted and entertained young children for many years. Based on Dick Bruna’s children’s books, this video provides a safe and caring environment where children can discover and explore a wide range of emotions. The following 10 episodes are included: Best friends are great; Miffy’s magnifying glass; Snip with scissors; Who are you?; Like or not?; What’s behind the door?; Hide and seek; Somehow different; Same or different?; Big or small?

results.title: Miffy at the zoo
results.creator_credit: Hertogenbosch, Meulenoff, Kodansha, Hilversham, Palm Plus and Gene Deitch
results.brief_description: Miffy, Dick Bruna’s lovable white rabbit is off to the zoo with her father. They travel by train and see lots of animals. The seven other stories are: 1. The Christmas book. - 2. The Circus. - 3. Another story to tell. - 4. Miffy at the playground. - 5. Snuffy’s puppies. - 6. The Fish. - 7. Poppy pig. The bold colours and solid shapes of the illustrations, accompanied by simple but entertaining stories make this highly suitable for young children.

results.title: Miffy at the hospital
results.brief_description: Based on the delightful children’s books by Dick Bruna about Miffy, the white rabbit, this tape includes 8 adventures with Miffy including: The Orchestra- Miffy at the hospital- Poppy’s birthday- The School- The Little Bird- Cinderella- Red Riding Hood and The Apple. Suitable for young children.

results.title: Miffy
results.creator_credit: Hertogenbosch, Meulenoff, Kodansha, Hilvershum, Palm Plus and Gene Deitch
results.brief_description: Miffy is a familiar friend to generations of very young children. Together with Snuffy, Farmer John, Poppy Pig, Boris and Barbara, she features in the family of characters from Dick Bruna’s much loved children’s books. These simple yet captivating stories will take children into the delightful world of Miffy and her friends. 1-Miffy 2-Miffy’s bicycle 3-Miffy at school 4-I Know about numbers 5-Miffy goes flying 6-Farmer John 7-Miffy’s dream 8-Snuffy.

results.title: Midwife: with woman
results.creator_credit: Maternity Centre Association and Mary Paul Wells
results.brief_description: This film traces the history of midwifery in America, describing its prominent role in colonial times, and its gradual restriction through professional standardisation. It also shows the process through which midwifery has regained acceptance and the film emphasises the view that pregnancy is not an illness and childbirth is not a surgical operation. Narrated by Mariette Hartley.
